metadata.Plot: This program presents the standard mix of movie clips, shots from the set and interviews as we get notes from cast and crew and looks at the story and its adaptation, Affleck's move to the director's chair, shooting in Boston, and the flick's themes.
metadata.Actors: Ben Affleck, Casey Affleck, Sean Bailey, Morgan Freeman
